title: Document new properties related to reference assemblies
body:
Document the things introduced for https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/issues/1986 in https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/pull/2039.

- [x] In https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/blob/master/docs/features/refout.md : https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/19969
- [x] In https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/visualstudio/msbuild/common-msbuild-project-properties : https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/visualstudio-docs/pull/229

cc @jcouv
